mapper.select: SELECT d.id, d.title, d.body, d.price, d.inserted, m.id memberId, m.nickName writerNickName FROM DesignBoard d LEFT JOIN Review r ON d.id = r.memberId JOIN Member m ON d.memberId = m.id GROUP BY d.id ORDER BY d.id DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO DesignBoard (title, body, price, memberId) VALUES (#{title}, #{body}, #{price}, #{memberId})
mapper.select: SELECT d.id, d.title, d.body, d.price, d.inserted, m.id memberId FROM DesignBoard d JOIN Member m ON d.memberId = m.id WHERE d.id = #{id}
